import React, { Component, useState } from "react"; import { Button, Card, CardBody, CardFooter, Col, Container, Form, Input, InputGroup, InputGroupAddon, InputGroupText, Row } from "reactstrap"; const styleErr = {border: '1px solid #FF3300'} const Register = () => { const [account, setAccout] = useState({}); const [err, setErr] = useState({}); const handleRegister = async () => { if(account.repPassword !== account.password) return setErr({ password: true }); await setAccout(prev => delete prev.repPassword); } return (

Register

{ setAccout(prev => ({ ...prev, username: value})) setErr(prev => ({...prev, username: false})) }} /> @ { setAccout(prev => ({ ...prev, email: value})) setErr(prev => ({...prev, email: false})) }} /> { setAccout(prev => ({ ...prev, password: value})) setErr(prev => ({...prev, password: false})) }} /> { setAccout(prev => ({ ...prev, repPassword: value})) setErr(prev => ({...prev, password: false})) }} />
); }; export default Register;
